1: <pb/><t>Natek Mamin Jehová jantak wal tzet yetal mayal ec'tok jiban on; ilawal chi yun jetax on.</t>
2: <t>A co satak, axac'al yul k'ab eb tx'ok conobal ayic'ok; axa jatut, yet-xa eb tx'ok animail yayji ocok.</t>
3: <t>Meba' unin onxac'al, c'amxa co mam on, axa eb co txutx on, mayal can eb tx'oklil, cax c'amxa yichamil eb.</t>
4: <t>A a' aej chi juc' on, tolxac'al chi co man a', axa co si' on, tolxac'al chi co tojlanej.</t>
5: <t>Ayc'al oc eb ajc'ul jin con yukten ec'ok; caw wal chon c'unbi, palta c'amxa chi yal c'ul eb chon xewi.</t>
6: <t>Max toj batxan co k'ab bay eb aj Egipto c'al bay eb aj Asiria, yuj co chaon ch'an jabok co lobej.</t>
7: <t>A eb jichmam on max oc is mul, palta mayal cam eb, axa jiban on chi titcan yailal yuj is mul eb tu'.</t>
8: <t>A tinani' ayon oc yul k'ab eb mosejal yayji, c'amxa mactxel chon colon el yul k'ab eb.</t>
9: <t>A jabok co lobej, puralxac'al chi ji', yujtol ay is may yuj eb ak'om owal bay tz'inan tx'otx'.</t>
10: <t>Mayal k'ekbi el co tz'umal, yuj chi tit k'ak' jin yuj wajil.</t>
11: <t>A bay Sión, c'al bay conoblak Judá, caw wal chi etnelay eb ix ix yetok eb ix k'opojtak ix.</t>
12: <t>Max aj locan eb co yajawil yuj eb ajc'ul oc jin, cax c'amxa jabok yelapnok eb cham icham winak yul sat eb.</t>
13: <t>A eb winak tol caw wal tec'an waayi, chi alay oc eb yin ak'oj coj harina; axa eb nak ach'ej chi telc'ojtok eb nak yalan si'.</t>
14: <t>C'amxa eb icham winak ayic' bay puertail-lak conob yin beyc'ulnewi. C'amxa eb ach'ej chi oc nuk' bitni.</t>
15: <t>C'amxa co tzalojc'ulal. A co canal yin tzalojc'ulal, cusc'ulalxa max yutcan aj ba.</t>
16: <t>Tok ayto co corona ayajok; ok'bal on c'ul, yuj max jaoc co mul.</t>
17: <t>Yuj tu' xan caw wal ya' on ay chi jabej, lananxa c'apax k'ektanil chi jila'.</t>
18: <t>A bay tzalan Sión, mayal uchchaj ay nalak; axac'al bay tu' chi ayji ec' no wax.</t>
19: <t>A pax ach ti' ach Jehová, Yajaw achc'al; ayc'al ec' ekbej yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
20: <t>¿Tzet yuj xan chon tojcan c'ayc'ulal oj yin junelnej? ¿Tzet yuj xan caw wal najatilxa on a bekoncanok?</t>
21: <t>Mamin Jehová, ion meltzoj ayach junelxa, axa co meltzoj tu'. Matawal watx' chi yun yec' junelxa juj, axca jayji yet yalantok.</t>
22: <t>Akxa tinani' max on entaknejcan el yin junelnej. Yelxac'al max tit yowal a c'ul jin on Mamin Jehová.</t>
